医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
了解 BIOne 250：适合微生物应用的经济型生物过程控制站Distek, Inc. 是 48 年来实验室制药仪器领域的领导者，自豪地推出专为微生物应用而设计的 BIOne 250 生物过程控制器。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Discover-the-BIOne-250-A-Budget-Friendly-Bioprocess-Control-Station-for-Microbial-Applications.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Discover-the-BIOne-250-A-Budget-Friendly-Bioprocess-Control-Station-for-Microbial-Applications.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4f6433eb-e848-4442-9591-5d0a3c8aa240 Fri, 09 Feb 2024 11:17:00 -0500 Discover the BIOne 250: A Budget Friendly Bioprocess Control Station for Microbial Applications
Aspen Biosciences 推出 Pipeline，这是专门用于药物发现的项目管理软件平台。突破性的“管道”平台现已可供治疗开发团队使用Aspen Biosciences 是一家为药物发现公司提供定制软件和集成的领先供应商，它很高兴地宣布推出 Pipeline，这是一个药物发现项目管理软件平台。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Aspen-Biosciences-launches-Pipeline-the-program-management-software-platform-specially-for-drug-discovery-The-groundwriting-e28098Pipelinee28099-Platform-现已可用于治疗开发团队.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Aspen-Biosciences-launches-Pipeline-the-program-management-software-platform-specially-for-drug-discovery-The-groundwriting-e28098Pipelinee28099-Platform-现在可用于治疗开发团队.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=170b17f3-8da3-46bf-9f06-dbae84bef35e Fri, 09 Feb 2024 10:44:00 -0500 Aspen Biosciences launches Pipeline, the program management software platform specifically for drug discovery. The groundbreaking ‘Pipeline’ Platform is now available for therapeutics development teams
研究通过显示健康老化大脑的神经代偿提供了重要的知识进步研究人员进行了全脑体素功能磁共振成像，以识别具有功能型补偿的大脑区域。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Study-provides-an-important-advancement-of-knowledge-by-showing-neural-compensation-in-healthy-aging-brains.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Study-provides-an-important-advancement-of-knowledge-by-showing-neural-compensation-in-healthy-aging-brains.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a625950a-21e2-4e2b-a3f8-c3985a53e8f2 Fri, 09 Feb 2024 09:25:00 -0500 Study provides an important advancement of knowledge by showing neural compensation in healthy aging brains
研究发现食物过敏者的生活质量存在性别差异研究人员检查了免疫球蛋白 E (IgE) 相关食物过敏患者及其护理人员的健康相关生活质量 (HRQL) 与生物性别之间的相关性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Study-finds-gender-disparity-in-quality-of-life-for-individuals-with-food-allergies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Study-finds-gender-disparity-in-quality-of-life-for-individuals-with-food-allergies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d907f27e-b39a-407a-8832-2e4cad4e725a Fri, 09 Feb 2024 08:45:00 -0500 Study finds gender disparity in quality of life for individuals with food allergies
研究表明，回收的食物垃圾可能受到药物残留物的污染新研究表明，回收的食物垃圾可能受到药物残留物的污染。好消息是，沼气沼渣中培养的真菌对这些污染物的吸收极少。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Recycled-food-waste-may-be-contamerated-with-pharmaceutical-residues-research-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Recycled-food-waste-may-be-contamerated-with-pharmaceutical-residues-research-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c3678f09-4734-4841-b4bd-f42b43af3ec9 Fri, 09 Feb 2024 08:29:25 -0500 Recycled food waste may be contaminated with pharmaceutical residues, research reveals
使用勃起功能障碍药物的男性患阿尔茨海默病的可能性较小伦敦大学学院研究人员领导的一项新研究发现，通常用于治疗勃起功能障碍的药物可能会降低患阿尔茨海默病的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Men-using-erectile-dysfunction-drugs-less-likely-to-develop-Alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Men-using-erectile-dysfunction-drugs-less-likely-to-develop-Alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9bfbd216-31f0-4559-bda8-8e6760036688 Fri, 09 Feb 2024 08:20:35 -0500 Men using erectile dysfunction drugs less likely to develop Alzheimer's disease
MHRA 授权 COVID-19 疫苗：Comirnaty 和 Nuvaxovid 获得批准在发现 Comirnaty Omicron XBB.1.5 30 微克/剂量（单剂量小瓶）符合英国监管机构的安全、质量和有效性标准后，药品和保健品监管机构 (MHRA) 批准更改其许可证。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/MHRA-authorizes-COVID-19-vaccines-Comirnaty-and-Nuvaxovid-gain-approvals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/MHRA-authorizes-COVID-19-vaccines-Comirnaty-and-Nuvaxovid-gain-approvals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=51394954-97f7-435f-9e22-02e3357bf853 Fri, 09 Feb 2024 08:15:10 -0500 MHRA authorizes COVID-19 vaccines: Comirnaty and Nuvaxovid gain approvals
研究发现，年长的亚裔美国人对参加 MRI 研究犹豫不决罗格斯大学健康学院主导的一项研究表明，与白人同龄人相比，亚裔美国人参与涉及核磁共振成像的健康研究的可能性较小，解决这种犹豫可能会改善研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Older-Asian-Americans-hesitant-to-participate-in-MRI-research-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Older-Asian-Americans-hesitant-to-participate-in-MRI-research-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2d1be5d5-c4cc-42e0-807e-47eb8dda6edb Fri, 09 Feb 2024 08:06:49 -0500 Older Asian Americans hesitant to participate in MRI research, study finds
研究表明，分手后女性抗抑郁药物的使用量比男性更大一项新研究探讨了经历离婚、同居分居或丧亲之痛的 50 至 70 岁芬兰成年人的抗抑郁药物使用模式，以及随后重新伴侣前后的使用趋势。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Women-experience-larger-increase-in-antidepressant-use-after-break-up-than-men-study-suggests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Women-experience-larger-increase-in-antidepressant-use-after-break-up-than-men-study-suggests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d1018753-6484-44a3-a53c-e0b9db82a3be Fri, 09 Feb 2024 07:20:00 -0500 Women experience larger increase in antidepressant use after break-up than men, study suggests
难道我们根本就不关心老人吗？老年人权益倡导者预测，新冠肺炎（covid-19）大流行将为美国敲响警钟：无可争议的证据表明，美国在照顾弱势老年人方面做得不够。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Do-we-simply-not-care-about-old-people.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Do-we-simply-not-care-about-old-people.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ed208ffb-ed57-45da-84a2-1932df30afe2 Fri, 09 Feb 2024 05:54:00 -0500 Do we simply not care about old people?
